DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether exercise improve cognitive motor function Parkinson 's disease . To test hypothesis , researcher study general brain function subject PD 6-months exercise program .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Activity Brain Parkinson 's Disease ( PD )
DOC.criteria: UPDRS < 15 LDOPA responsive < 5 yr since diagnosis severe diseases MMSE < 26 treatment psychiatric medication
